x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description:
Set "change.conflict.allow_contiguous_changes" system property to true for Zboot instances.
When conflict checking for similar change requests (by Affected CIs or Assigned to) find records that overlap with the current change request only.
Old behavior did not allow change requests that start at the same time as the end time of the current change request or a change request that ends at the same time as the start time of the current change request.
As an example the following change requests apply to the same configuration item.
CHG01, start: 2019-01-01 03:00:00 end: 2019-01-01 04:00:00. CHG02, start: 2019-01-01 04:00:00 end: 2019-01-01 05:00:00.
If this property is set to true these contiguous change requests will not conflict, if the property is set to false they will conflict.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Allow contiguous change requests zboot

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_8ea3338483e89e50c6695855eeaad3c6

Old behavior did not allow change requests that start at the same time as the end time of the current change request or a change request that ends at the same time as the start time of the current change request.

CHG01, start: 2019-01-01 03:00:00 end: 2019-01-01 04:00:00. CHG02, start: 2019-01-01 04:00:00 end: 2019-01-01 05:00:00.
